text:
The Lamborghini Jalpa is a sports car. Lamborghini built it from 1981 to 1988. The Jalpa came after the Silhouette. The Jalpa was designed by Carrozzeria Bertone.
History.
The Jalpa was introduced at the 1981 Geneva Auto Show. It was based off the Silhouette. Lamborghini designed it to be less expensive than the Countach.
Engine and transmission.
The Jalpa was powered by a V8 engine. The engine in the Jalpa came from the Silhouette. The Jalpa’s engine had a power output of, and of torque. The engine in the US models made.
Performance.
Lamborghini said that the Jalpa could accelerate from 0 to in 6.0 seconds. They also said that it could reach in 19.1 seconds. The top speed of the Jalpa was. The Jalpa weighed.
